mean_en: (of people or their behaviour) hard and cruel; determined to get what you want and not caring if you hurt other people
sentence: Instead of saving his friend, the ruthless lion tried to kill him.
sentence_trans: 这只残忍的狮子非但不救他的朋友，反而想杀了他。
word_etyma: ruth怜悯，悲哀 + less形容词后缀，无…，不… → ruthless无情的，残忍的
